summary: This document contains details from a World Check report regarding Richard Kahn, including his identification and connections to various individuals and entities. It highlights his status as a limited partner with PennMont Securities and mentions violations related to NYSE Arca Equities rules.

events.title: Violation of NYSE Arca Equities Rule
events.description: Richard Kahn was found by the Business Conduct Committee to be in violation of NYSE Arca Equities Rule by failing to provide testimony as requested by FINRA.

events.title: Permanent Bar from NYSE Arca Membership
events.description: Richard Kahn was to be permanently barred from NYSE Arca membership unless testimony was provided within the required time frame.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is identified as a limited partner with PennMont Securities.
Richard Kahn was found in violation of NYSE Arca Equities Rule for failing to provide testimony.
Richard Kahn faced a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless he provided testimony.
